	charset="iso-8859-1"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable

Burning Hammer sees Stranato and Inzola laying on the ground. He looks just=
 in time to see a small lump under the ground disappear. He fires at the gr=
ound, but too late. He grabs Inzola and Stranato and drags them into the ba=
se and into a CR Chamber. He walks outside of the base and starts hunting t=
he ground for that thing he saw.

Weight awakes to a slow drip. He panicks =
when he finds himself healed quite nicely.

"CR work? Ha! Serge failed to t=
hink about what I can...uhh, do...if..." Weight searches for weapons. His w=
eapons are gone. Oh, well, at least he wasn't a nice mech fluid puddle and =
was still inone piece. But this would be continuous torture for sure. Damn =
Technosis, she must have a pea sized brain.

"Hello! Mighty dragon! I know =
you can hear me! Ha! You didn't get rid of me, I'm still alive and almost w=
ell! How do you like that? I may take forever, but I'm going to tear you wi=
de open, you hear me?" Serge heard but ignored him. Other bots, Doom Ice an=
d Rizopas, who were near by, heard as well.

"What the pit?" Rizopas says.
=

'Ha, it's just that little idiot Serge devoured so long ago." Doom ice say=
s.

"He sounda angry and not one bit hurt." Rizopas says. He fired at Minio=
n.

"Nah, what is he going to do? If anyone wanted him we'd have a prisoner=
, but they instead we have an annoyance." Doom ice says. she fires at Minio=
n as well.

"Technosis I...am in trouble." Weight says. The commlink was go=
ne. Well, it was more roomy than before.

"You have to get repaired sometim=
e, Serge, I won't die, I'll haunt you forever!" Weight says. He laughs very=
 low and thinks of something to do.
